page.title: 12PLAYGROUND GAMES (1)
page.content:
{}
{UPS AND DOWNS}: To play this game you can use the netball pitches because you need two circles as home areas. One person is {IT}in the middle of the playing area and the rest are in either of the circles. These have to run from one circle to the other and are chased by the one in the middle. If you are touched whilst outside the circle then you are{IT }as well. If players refuse to run, or run only rarely, then the people who are{IT}can give them a countdown during which they must run, if not they are {IT automatically. The first person caught is{IT}to start the next game.
